-- | Instances of vector-space classes for OpenGL types
--   
--   Instances of <a>http://hackage.haskell.org/package/vector-space</a>
--   classes for <a>OpenGL</a> types.
@package vector-space-opengl
@version 0.1


-- | Instances of <a>AdditiveGroup</a>, <a>VectorSpace</a>,
--   <a>InnerSpace</a>, <a>HasCross2</a>, <a>HasCross3</a>, and
--   <a>AffineSpace</a> from
--   <a>http://hackage.haskell.org/package/vector-space</a> for a selection
--   of the <tt>Graphics.Rendering.OpenGL</tt> types.
module Data.VectorSpace.OpenGL
instance AffineSpace a => AffineSpace (Normal3 a)
instance Num a => HasCross3 (Normal3 a)
instance (InnerSpace a, AdditiveGroup (Scalar a)) => InnerSpace (Normal3 a)
instance VectorSpace a => VectorSpace (Normal3 a)
instance AdditiveGroup a => AdditiveGroup (Normal3 a)
instance AffineSpace a => AffineSpace (TexCoord4 a)
instance (InnerSpace a, AdditiveGroup (Scalar a)) => InnerSpace (TexCoord4 a)
instance VectorSpace a => VectorSpace (TexCoord4 a)
instance AdditiveGroup a => AdditiveGroup (TexCoord4 a)
instance AffineSpace a => AffineSpace (TexCoord3 a)
instance Num a => HasCross3 (TexCoord3 a)
instance (InnerSpace a, AdditiveGroup (Scalar a)) => InnerSpace (TexCoord3 a)
instance VectorSpace a => VectorSpace (TexCoord3 a)
instance AdditiveGroup a => AdditiveGroup (TexCoord3 a)
instance AffineSpace a => AffineSpace (TexCoord2 a)
instance AdditiveGroup a => HasCross2 (TexCoord2 a)
instance (InnerSpace a, AdditiveGroup (Scalar a)) => InnerSpace (TexCoord2 a)
instance VectorSpace a => VectorSpace (TexCoord2 a)
instance AdditiveGroup a => AdditiveGroup (TexCoord2 a)
instance AffineSpace a => AffineSpace (TexCoord1 a)
instance (InnerSpace a, AdditiveGroup (Scalar a)) => InnerSpace (TexCoord1 a)
instance VectorSpace a => VectorSpace (TexCoord1 a)
instance AdditiveGroup a => AdditiveGroup (TexCoord1 a)
instance AffineSpace a => AffineSpace (Color4 a)
instance (InnerSpace a, AdditiveGroup (Scalar a)) => InnerSpace (Color4 a)
instance VectorSpace a => VectorSpace (Color4 a)
instance AdditiveGroup a => AdditiveGroup (Color4 a)
instance AffineSpace a => AffineSpace (Color3 a)
instance Num a => HasCross3 (Color3 a)
instance (InnerSpace a, AdditiveGroup (Scalar a)) => InnerSpace (Color3 a)
instance VectorSpace a => VectorSpace (Color3 a)
instance AdditiveGroup a => AdditiveGroup (Color3 a)
instance AffineSpace a => AffineSpace (Vertex4 a)
instance (InnerSpace a, AdditiveGroup (Scalar a)) => InnerSpace (Vertex4 a)
instance VectorSpace a => VectorSpace (Vertex4 a)
instance AdditiveGroup a => AdditiveGroup (Vertex4 a)
instance AffineSpace a => AffineSpace (Vertex3 a)
instance Num a => HasCross3 (Vertex3 a)
instance (InnerSpace a, AdditiveGroup (Scalar a)) => InnerSpace (Vertex3 a)
instance VectorSpace a => VectorSpace (Vertex3 a)
instance AdditiveGroup a => AdditiveGroup (Vertex3 a)
instance AffineSpace a => AffineSpace (Vertex2 a)
instance AdditiveGroup a => HasCross2 (Vertex2 a)
instance (InnerSpace a, AdditiveGroup (Scalar a)) => InnerSpace (Vertex2 a)
instance VectorSpace a => VectorSpace (Vertex2 a)
instance AdditiveGroup a => AdditiveGroup (Vertex2 a)
instance AffineSpace a => AffineSpace (Vertex1 a)
instance (InnerSpace a, AdditiveGroup (Scalar a)) => InnerSpace (Vertex1 a)
instance VectorSpace a => VectorSpace (Vertex1 a)
instance AdditiveGroup a => AdditiveGroup (Vertex1 a)
instance AffineSpace a => AffineSpace (Vector4 a)
instance (InnerSpace a, AdditiveGroup (Scalar a)) => InnerSpace (Vector4 a)
instance VectorSpace a => VectorSpace (Vector4 a)
instance AdditiveGroup a => AdditiveGroup (Vector4 a)
instance AffineSpace a => AffineSpace (Vector3 a)
instance Num a => HasCross3 (Vector3 a)
instance (InnerSpace a, AdditiveGroup (Scalar a)) => InnerSpace (Vector3 a)
instance VectorSpace a => VectorSpace (Vector3 a)
instance AdditiveGroup a => AdditiveGroup (Vector3 a)
instance AffineSpace a => AffineSpace (Vector2 a)
instance AdditiveGroup a => HasCross2 (Vector2 a)
instance (InnerSpace a, AdditiveGroup (Scalar a)) => InnerSpace (Vector2 a)
instance VectorSpace a => VectorSpace (Vector2 a)
instance AdditiveGroup a => AdditiveGroup (Vector2 a)
instance AffineSpace a => AffineSpace (Vector1 a)
instance (InnerSpace a, AdditiveGroup (Scalar a)) => InnerSpace (Vector1 a)
instance VectorSpace a => VectorSpace (Vector1 a)
instance AdditiveGroup a => AdditiveGroup (Vector1 a)
instance AffineSpace GLdouble
instance AffineSpace GLfloat
instance AffineSpace GLint
instance AffineSpace GLshort
instance AffineSpace GLbyte
instance InnerSpace GLdouble
instance InnerSpace GLfloat
instance VectorSpace GLdouble
instance VectorSpace GLfloat
instance VectorSpace GLint
instance VectorSpace GLshort
instance VectorSpace GLbyte
instance AdditiveGroup GLdouble
instance AdditiveGroup GLfloat
instance AdditiveGroup GLint
instance AdditiveGroup GLshort
instance AdditiveGroup GLbyte
